import React, {useState} from "react"; import "./styles.css" function Form(){ const [formu, setFormu] = useState({ nome:"", email:"", psw:"", pswConfirm:"" }); function enviaFormulario(node){ const {campo, value} = node.target setFormu({...formu, [campo]: value}) console.log(formu) } function msgSucesso(node){ alert('testando') } return(
) } export default Form;
